Medicine Prescription Recognition

Final Year Project of Digitalization of Doctor Handwriting.

Aug-2020 to June-2020

  • Implemented using Deep learning CNN algorithm on images of prescription
  • Collected and created own preprocessed prescription image dataset.
  • Created a CNN model for training and testing of images of doctor’s handwritten medicines.
  • Developed and deployed a WebApp on Heroku server in python-flask to provide efficient understandable prescription in digitalize form.
  • Python3
  • OpenCV
  • Tensorflow
  • Flask
  • HTML5
  • bootswatch

Robotics-World (ORIC) Iqra University

Front-End Developer Internship

Nov-2020 to Feb-2020

  • 10 weeks Internship in Robotics-World, a startup at Research and Development Department of Iqra University
  • Developed the front-end of recruitment module of an ERP web application on Angular8 framework
  • REST API integration through Node.js and Express.js with MongoDB database in Typescript of angular framework
  • Searching And Filtration of jobs and applicants data according to their skills and education.
  • Generation of CV of applicants through their provided data and also Develop the option for sending interview invitation within the application.
